attributes.action: stay in office indefinitely, for the good of the country and the wider world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Clearly, the biggest mistake in the history of this great nation would be for Tony Blair, our resolute and steadfast leader, to stand down as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. This is not for party political reasons but for the good governance of Britain. I would urge all right-thinking people to consider signing this petition and ensure that the message to the Prime Minister is clear... We are Blairites, now and for the long term!
